cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DB. 

The paper deals with the task of short text clustering, which is a common problem in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The proposed method involves the use of classification algorithms, which are commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the use of clustering algorithms such as k-means and hierarchical clustering, which are commonly used in data mining and database systems (cs.DB).
